thread.title: OT Preview: Morley Stanwood hosts Holton in "Fans' Choice Game of the Week"
thread.title_full: OT Preview: Morley Stanwood hosts Holton in "Fans' Choice Game of the Week"

author: Joe Buczek
title: OT Preview: Morley Stanwood hosts Holton in "Fans' Choice Game of the Week"
text:
JoeBuczek@9and10news.com 
MORLEY – Morley Stanwood welcomes in fellow Central State Activities Association Silver Division foe Holton Friday night as our “Fans’ Choice Game of the Week,” leading off the Double Overtime portion our Sports Overtime. 
For our “Overtime on the Road” matchup, Big Rapids hosts Reed City in a battle for first place in the Central State Activities Association Gold Division. 
The Cardinals (4-1, 3-0 CSAA) have dropped five straight to the Coyotes (5-0, 3-0 CSAA), but have been thriving under first-year head coach Mike Selzer. 
"Year in and year out, no matter what the talent level is, no matter what the records are, this is typically a very good game,” Reed City coach Monty Price said. “It really amps up the competition level and the competitiveness of both teams and both programs." 
We'll have a live preview from Big Rapids on Friday's 9&10 News at 6 p.m. 
These are just two of the 15 local games that we plan to show Friday night on Sports Overtime. 
SHANNON McGRATTAN 
Reed City at Big Rapids – 7 p.m.
